org.teatrove.examples.directorybrowser
Class DirectoryBrowserContext

java.lang.Object
  org.teatrove.examples.directorybrowser.DirectoryBrowserContext

public class DirectoryBrowserContext
extends Object

This is a TeaServlet context that is registered via the directory browser application. It provides access to functions that templates may invoke to traverse a directory structure.

Constructor Summary
DirectoryBrowserContext(ApplicationRequest request, ApplicationResponse response, DirectoryBrowserApplication app)
           
 
Method Summary
 File[] getFiles()
          Gets an array of files in the directory specified by the "path" query parameter.
